__e: I--and you know what, I hate the name.

I hated that bastard... but when it was said and done, he just wanted what was best for his men.
The truth is, is that I hated that car.
Okay, well, um, I didn't hate that part of the job, but I actually need the money.
And I hated you that night we played. I thought you changed, but... guess I was wrong.
Oh, my God, I have a fiance!

-but I love them now, and I don't know why.
I ain't meant what I said about hating you.
